name: Ginger Fizz and Pearls with a Twist
description:
This yummy choker necklace is two necklaces in one. The inner necklace is a short choker of ginger-beer coloured glass seed beads strung simply on coated steel cord, whilst the outer necklace is primarily peach pearls and ginger glass beads on a handmade, antiqued sterling silver chain, securely attached to more glass beads on steel. The necklace closes with a pewter heart-and-arrow toggle clasp.
Length is approximately 13.75 inches (inner necklace) and 15.75 inches (outer necklace).
____________________________ Inspirational Tale: Sometimes you just need ginger beer. That is all.

name: Lady Thornapple's Onyx Jangles
description:
These handmade earrings are made with solid sterling silver ear wires, ruby-coloured glass and onyx faceted beads on solid silver wire.
_________________________

Inspirational Tale: Lady Thornapple Von BonBonerie has granted exclusive permission to Gin Cherry to replicate one of her favourite designs, inspired by the ginberry.

name: Lady Speedwell's Obsidian Dandies
description: These handmade earrings are designed with solid sterling silver ear wires, faceted Rainbow Obsidian rectangles and Onyx faceted beads on solid silver wire with solid silver chain. This particular set of Rainbow Obsidian stones are nearly black, with a gorgeous, subtle green-grey flash. _________________________ Inspirational Tale: Lady Speedwell Von Nostrum accidentally told me of her youthful indiscretions one evening whilst imbibing litres of sloe gin martinis. The next morning her messenger accosted me with a hand-scrawled letter skewered upon a sword, stating that if I dared share her tales I would be fed to her pomeranian. As a vow of my silence, I made her these Obsidian earrings, which she accepted with only the slightest flaring of her nostrils.

name: Dame Delica's Aquamarine Dropsies
description: These delicate earrings are made with handmade solid sterling silver ear wires, faceted Rose Quartz and faceted Aquamarine beads on solid silver wire. Special care instructions: The Dropsy earrings are loose-strung, which means that you must take care to ensure the hook-end remains at the angle in which you receive the earrings. They are easy to adjust and with reasonable care, you shall not risk losing your gemstones. _______________ Inspirational Tale: Dame Hortense Delica demanded I create these earrings for her out of the teensiest rose quartz and aquamarine faceted stones known to humanity. I protested, knowing the difficulty in harvesting the stones and coaxing them onto the silver wire, but she locked me in her scarf closet until I relented. Here they are. Enjoy.

name: Lady Rhubarb's Garden of Lush
description:
This handmade necklace is designed with: green glass leaves, pink glass flowers, pinky-red glass flat beads, delicious fucshia glass teardrop beads, and round dyed pink marble beads. They are all strung and knotted on pink silk jeweller's cord. The dangles are attached to a silver-plated flower, and the necklace fastens with an antiqued silver-plated Victorian toggle clasp.
Length is approximately 15 inches, plus approximately 2 inches of dangles. ____________________________ Inspirational Tale: As you can imagine, walking through Lady Rhubarb Von Pigwell's garden is a bit like walking in a dream. I don't mean it's beautiful and dreamy. I mean it's so overgrown you can hardly move your legs. I was trespassing, fair enough, but I think throwing gin bottles at me was a bit much. I made this eccentric necklace to placate her.
